summary:

Belarusian State University, Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science, Bachelor of Computer Science

profile_positions.description:
Domain: Patent Granting

Project Description:
Framework of SOAP and REST Web Services that automates Priority Documents Exchange between Patent Offices (such as European Patent Office, United States Patent and Trademark Office, Japanese Patent Office, etc).
Highly performant and highly available system right in the heart of business process automation.

Senior Software Engineer

- Test automation
- Load testing
- Performance optimization

profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Domain: Electronic Document Workflow

Project Description:
Web-base document viewer which is a part of a complete Electronic Document Workflow Suite. 
Is used for quick preview of documents at different stages of office workflow.
In addition to viewing capabilities application allows users to annotate documents in a way similar to PDF annotations.
Supports files of PDF, RTF, TXT types and various image formats. 
Has strict performance and scalability requirements.

Position:
Senior Software Engineer, Tech Lead of Local Team

Responsibilities:
- Software design and implementation, 
- Technical leadership

Languages and Tools:
Java SE, Java Servlet API, Spring Framework, GWT, GIN, Guava, Jakarta Commons, Ant, Maven2/3, Enterprise Architect, IntelliJ IDEA, Eclipse, JUnit, Hamcrest, Easy Mock, XmlUnit, TestNG, Selenium, Checkstyle, Findbugs, Cobertura, Emma, Sonar, Subversion, Git, Jenkins, Gerrit,
Tomcat

Team Size:
5 (distributed team)
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer, Tech Lead

profile_positions.description:
Domain: Telecommunications

Project Description:
Expenses optimization engine in the field of mobile communications. 
The system analyzes billing info provided by users in order to produce recommendations how to minimize their current expenses if it's possible.
The system recognizes usage template (timing of voice calling, texting and web browsing) by mean of automated data parsing:
- either from PDF documents generated by mobile operator and sent to users via email and later manually uploaded by them to our system; 
- or from personal account statistics pages available on a web site of mobile operator.
With usage template recognized the system goes through a database of all tariffs available on the market, extrapolates user's behaviour on a period of the offer and estimates user's expenses. 

Position:
Senior Software Engineer

Responsibilities:
- Implementation of PDF parsers
- Web Development

Languages and Tools:
Java SE, Java Servlet API, Spring Framework, Hibernate, Wicket, EhCache, PdfBox, Jakarta Commons, DbUnit, jQuery, Javascript, AJAX
Maven2, IntelliJ IDEA, JUnit, Hamcrest, Easy Mock, Checkstyle, Clover, JProbe, Subversion, Jetty, CruiseControl
Tomcat, MySQL, Amazon EC2

Team Size:
5
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Domain: Car dealership, ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system

Project Description:
ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system for a car dealer which spans:
- Human resources
- Servicing
-- work orders
-- scheduling
-- workflow management
-- activity management
-- billing
- Supply chain management
-- Inventory
-- Order entry
- Access Control
Large-scale enterprise application with strict scalability requirements.

Position:
Senior Software Engineer, Tech Lead (for 5-7 developers)

Responsibilities:
- Requirements Estimation
- Analysis, Design and Development
- Setting up Development Process
- Mentoring
- Code Review

Languages and tools:
JavaEE, EJB3, JMS, Hibernate, JSF, Facelets, Richfaces, Jakarta Commons, ANTLR, Jasper Reports, Groovy

Oracle, PostgreSQL, Glassfish v2

25 developers + Business Analysis Team
